title: History of Breitling
description: Explore Breitling’s evolution through its key milestones, from its founding to its modern renaissance.

title: Inspiration and Positioning
description: Understand Breitling’s brand values, mission, and how it connects with today’s conscious consumers.

title: Understanding the Collection
description: Explore Breitling’s diverse watch collections and learn how each line reflects the brand’s values, heritage, and innovation.

title: Storytelling
description: Master the art of storytelling by understanding how to convey Breitling’s unique narrative and emotional appeal to customers.

title: Core collections
description: Deep dive into Breitling’s core collections—understand their key features, design inspirations, and target audiences.

title: Novelties 1
description: Discover the latest Breitling novelties and learn how to present them effectively to meet customer expectations and market trends.

title: Novelties 3
description: Stay updated on the newest innovations and product launches within Breitling’s lineup to elevate your product knowledge.

title: Presenting the Collection
description: Learn best practices for presenting the Breitling collection in-store or online, creating an engaging and premium customer experience.

title: Marketing
description: Explore Breitling’s marketing strategies—understand key campaigns, brand partnerships, and how to leverage them in your sales approach.

title: Made in Breitling
description: Uncover the craftsmanship, technical expertise, and manufacturing excellence that define the “Made in Breitling” standard.

title: Sustainability
description: Understand Breitling’s commitment to sustainability and how its practices align with the values of today’s environmentally conscious customers.
